fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • Reviewing Tides, we referred to three people sharing a boat “with their friend, Amanda (Amanda Rawnsley)”, and indicated that she was pictured. The lead female character referred to and pictured was Red, played by Robyn Isaac, not Rawnsley (7 December, page 15, G2). • Sissy Spacek did not have a role in the 1984 film Places in the Heart. A feature meant to refer to the 1986 film Crimes of the Heart (The miracle of Sissy Spacek, 7 December, page 5, G2). • Other recently corrected articles include: Group led by Thomas Piketty presents plan for ‘a fairer Europe’ Man charged in ‘biggest sexual offence case in Norway’s history’ Republicans are undermining democracy state by state
